articles.title: Elon Musk scores a rare win in lawsuit as Twitter is ordered to hand over documents from fired manager - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Twitter will have to produce documents from its former general manager as Musk's lawyers demand new information on data.
articles.content:
• Lawyers for Musk last week demanded that documents from 22 Twitter employees be handed over.
  • The judge overseeing the case ordered documents from just one employee, Kayvon Beykpour.
